name: userin-form-gray-quail
description: Configurable JS form widget that uses the UserIn middleware to login to Apps using popular Identity Providers such as Facebook, Google, LinkedIn, GitHub, ...

scripts.build: WEBPACK_ENV=dev webpack && WEBPACK_ENV=build webpack && node minifyCss.js
scripts.lint: eslint index.js src/ test/ minifyCSS.js server.js webpack.config.js updateDocVersion.js --fix
scripts.push: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish

author: Nicolas Dao
